titles.title: Military Aviation Training Safeguard Act

To authorize the deviation from service level requirement of military aircraft operating outside of designated Department of Defense airspace in the wilderness areas in mountainous regions if necessary to maintain safety of flight.
Military Aviation Training Safeguard Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Military Aviation Training Safeguard Act
This bill allows military aircraft operating outside of designated Department of Defense airspace while flying in wilderness areas in mountainous regions to deviate from service level requirements if necessary to maintain safety of flight.
